text: The plasmid 3XMHC-luc ( a generous gift from Drs . J . Westwick and D.A . Brenner , University of North Carolina , Chapel Hill ) contains three copies of NF-kappaB - responsive element from the MHC class I locus , placed upstream of the <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene .
Human monocytic THP-1 cells were transiently transfected as previously described [ 30 ] , and then cultured for 4 h alone or with increasing concentration of either C10 or C40 .
<extra_id_0> Luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> activity was determined using a luminometer ( Monolight 2010 Luminometer , Ann Arbor , MI ) .
